parts:
Hi E-Jay! ✨️

Daniel and I are looking forward to seeing you at our wedding celebration on Saturday, 26 July 2025! 💕

Details are as follows:

CHURCH CEREMONY, 9AM
The Bible Church Singapore
(Building name is Clementi Bible Centre)
152 West Coast Road
Singapore 127370

- Reception and photo table will be open for viewing from 9am. Please be seated in the Peace Sanctuary (Level 3) by 9.15am
- Parking lots are available at the open air HDB carpark at 609  Clementi West Street 1, Singapore 120609
- If you are taking public transport and need directions, do let me know 😀
- Slides for the ceremony and an Appendix with our reasons for our choice of songs and reading are now available at https://tinyurl.com/beljmdchoc-ceremony-booklet or via our website withjoy.com/daniel-and-bernadette (Unlock guest details with: BeljmDChoc)
- A fun and easy crossword puzzle can be found at https://tinyurl.com/beljmdchoc-cocktail-crosswords or via our website


Thank you! Can't wait to see you soon! 🥰

Love, Bernadette and Daniel
@BeljmDChoc

---

Thank you so much for extending your Wedding Invite to me earlier this year, and I definitely look forward to attending!
I'm truly happy for you & Daniel and wish you both all the best!

---

Bernadette is my colleague at my tuition center. Enhance my response to her

Here’s a warmer, slightly more detailed reply you could send to Bernadette—feel free to tweak any personal touches:

---

Hi Bernadette! ✨

Thank you so much for the lovely invitation—and for all the helpful details and links. I’m delighted to celebrate this special moment with you and Daniel on **Saturday, 26 July**.

I’ve saved the ceremony booklet, song notes, and the crossword (looks fun!) and will make sure to arrive at the Peace Sanctuary before 9 : 15 am. I’ll park at the open-air HDB lot on Clementi West St 1, but if anything changes I’ll let you know.

Please let me know if there’s anything I can help with—whether last-minute logistics, ushering, or simply an extra pair of hands on the day. Otherwise, I’ll just come ready to rejoice with you both.

Looking forward to seeing you soon and sharing in your joy!

Warmest congratulations again,  
E-Jay 💕

---
